All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
HtmlTableEditorPane.TableEditorKit
public class IXHtmlEditorKit
extends javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit

An HTMLEditorKit customised for use in I-X applications. At present, it just ensures that a nicer default font is used.

See Also:
Serialized Form
